snippet: Frank DiMattina, former owner of the popular Staten Island catering hall Ariana’s, forced a rival to withdraw a bid on a lucrative contract for school lunches.
abstract: Frank DiMattina, former owner of popular Staten Island catering hall Ariana's, is convicted of extortion and a related firearms charge for forcing a rival caterer Walter Bowers to withdraw his bid on a lucrative school lunch program contract.
lead_paragraph: Frank DiMattina, former owner of the popular Staten Island catering hall Ariana’s, forced a rival to withdraw a bid on a lucrative contract for school lunches.

headline.seo: Caterer Linked to Organized Crime Is Convicted of Extortion
headline.main: Caterer Tied to the Mob Is Convicted
headline.print_headline: Caterer Tied To the Mob Is Convicted
